mean_cn: v. 把…归因于；把…归属于
mean_en: to say or think that (something) is caused by, comes from, or is associated with (something or someone)
word_etyma: a向上+scribe写→把…写上去→归因于
short_phrase: ascribe his death to his smoking habit
sentence: His family ascribed his early death to his smoking habit.
sentence_trans: 他家人把他的早死归因于他吸烟的习惯。
